name: ILIASClientSideTools
short_description:
This plugin for ilias contains the following enhancements for the usability of ILIAS:

1: Maximum character input checker
    Displays information about the left possible chars in a textfield (designed for the "Antrag mit Bestätigung" field) and cuts chars, if the maximum is reached.

2: Browser-Dependend information messages
    Displays a short information message for specific browser versions. (e.g. update notice)

3: Keep open sessions
    Keeps a session open, as long, as the user has an ilias page opend in browser

4: Picture of the Day
    Displays a picture depending on the current day
summary: Collection of tools for enhanced usability with ILIAS
